title: Grant-Kohrs Ranch National Historic Site: Cooperating Association
body: Cooperating Association       The Glacier Natural History Association (GNHA), established in 1946, has provided 60 years of educational and interpretive support to the National Park Service.   GNHA is a nonprofit cooperating association of the National Park Service. GNHA helps to support Grant-Kohrs Ranch's educational, interpretive, cultural and scientific programming needs with aid generated by bookstore sales. For more information regarding this important partner, please visit the Glacier Natural History Association website at www.glacierassociation.org.
